channel.title: Enter the Radtrix
channel.description:
# Enter the Radtrix
![image|480x480, 100%](upload://9pDD2Q9tQSXZ4io6U5khFLl6HpU.jpeg)
> Pick your favorite Lambo NFT! >The Blue Pill or the Red Pill? What if I told you there were other pills? Different pills lead to different outcomes. Choose wisely... **Price of each NFT**: From 10 XRD to 80 XRD, depending on NFT. **Links**: * [Website](https://www.entertheradtrix.com/) **Social:** * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/EnterTheRadtrix) * [Telegram](https://t.me/Enter_The_Radtrix)
